author: Medal Melodies

text: Great peaceful theme for an excellent SRPG that never left Japan, but which thankfully got translated by DeJap. I think this and Mother 1 might be the first two games I played with unofficial english translations, I'm glad those exist. Square released their last 5 games on the SNES in the span of 4 months in 1996: Bahamut Lagoon, Front Mission: Gun Hazard, Super Mario RPG, Treasure of the Rudras and Treasure Hunter G. Pretty crazy.
author: SupraDarky

text: can you upload "Sacrifice Part 3" or "Innocent Sea" from Seiken Densetsu 3 alias Secret of Mana 2 ? It's from my favorite old school RPG of all time and I think that the final boss theme really deserves to be listened to :) Justcheck it for a brief moment, I think it is as good as SoM1
author: Evilriku13

text: There was never an unofficial English translation for Mother 1. The translation for Mother 1 was the completed prototype for it that leaked on the internet and then the anti-piracy measures were removed.
